response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled value, we believe it would be a significant asset to your collection or business. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. We are confident that once you experience its exceptional qualities, you will appreciate its true worth. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 750000}
